# begin(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Presents the panel as a modeless window.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func begin(completionHandler handler: @escaping (NSApplication.ModalResponse) -> Void)
```

```swift
@MainActor func begin() async -> NSApplication.ModalResponse
```

## Parameters

- **handler**: The block to call after the user closes the panel. This block has no return value and takes a single parameter:



## Discussion

Configure all of the relevant properties of the panel before you call this method.

## Showing the Panel

- **beginSheetModal(for:completionHandler:)**: Presents the panel as a sheet modal to the specified window.
- **runModal()**: Displays the panel and begins its event loop with the current working (or last-selected) directory as the default starting point.
- **validateVisibleColumns()**: Validates and reloads the browser columns visible in the panel.
